entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:23 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 12:06 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 11.5°C
Wind: SSW 36 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
